title: Plus signs (+) in filename mirrored as spaces or fails to mirror
body:
Hi, Thanks for all the hard work on rclone! I've been using it to make offsite backups of my data to Microsoft OneDrive, and I noticed filenames with plus signs (+) were returning `File not in Local file system at /home/devin/d/data` in my logs. It appears rclone is replacing "+" with spaces (`tes+t.txt` becomes `tes t.txt`), and failing to copy filenames that start with "+" (`+test.txt` fails to copy). I'm pretty sure "+" is a valid character in both Windows and Linux, and I had no trouble copying the same files to OneDrive manually. I also tried syncing with rclone to Google Drive, and did not have this issue. Using a dummy folder ~/tmp, I collected the following info: - Version: rclone v1.32 - OS: Windows 10 x64 and Ubuntu 16.04 x64 - Destination: Microsoft OneDrive (Google Drive works as expected) - Commands: `rclone sync "/home/me/tmp" "onedrive:tmp" -v --retries 1` and `rclone copy "/home/me/tmp" "onedrive:tmp" -v --retries 1` both fail. - Comparing the directories: Source is `rclone ls "/home/me/tmp" -q`: 
        6 test3.t+xt
        5 test+a.txt
        6 +test.txt
        5 a/test+a.txt
Destination `rclone ls "onedrive:tmp" -q` is missing a file, other filenames changed: 
        5 test a.txt
        6 test3.t xt
        5 a/test a.txt
- Sample log: 
2016/08/16 23:45:10 rclone: Version "v1.32" starting with parameters ["rclone" "sync" "/home/me/tmp" "onedrive:tmp" "--config" ".rclone.conf" "-v" "--retries" "1"]
  2016/08/16 23:45:11 One drive root 'tmp': Modify window is 1s
  2016/08/16 23:45:11 One drive root 'tmp': Reading ""
  2016/08/16 23:45:11 One drive root 'tmp': Finished reading ""
  2016/08/16 23:45:11 One drive root 'tmp': Waiting for checks to finish
  2016/08/16 23:45:11 One drive root 'tmp': Waiting for transfers to finish
  2016/08/16 23:45:12 +test.txt: Failed to copy: invalidRequest: nameContainsInvalidCharacters: Path (/LiveFolders/tmp/ test.txt) contains invalid leading character.
  2016/08/16 23:45:12 +test.txt: Removing failed copy
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 test+a.txt: Copied (new)
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 test3.t+xt: Copied (new)
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 +test.txt: Failed to remove failed copy: invalidRequest: generalException: API not found
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 a/test+a.txt: Copied (new)
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 One drive root 'tmp': not deleting files as there were IO errors
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 Attempt 1/1 failed with 1 errors and: not deleting files as there were IO errors
  2016/08/16 23:45:13 Failed to sync: not deleting files as there were IO errors
